⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }[ae]c1)
⊣ (w0 →({ s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }[ae]c1 ↔(c1 ` { s0 ∈ c0 | ¬ w1 })= 0))

⊣ (w0 → w1)
⊣ d(s0, ∅)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ⋃ ran(measures))
⊣ (c1 ∈ ⋃ ran(measures)↔ c1 ∈(measures ` dom(c1)))
⊣ (c1 ∈(measures ` dom(c1))→(c1 ` ∅)= 0)
